video:video.video:description:
Automate iPhone Screen Mirroring to Tesla | Effortless Setup Guide
Discover how to effortlessly configure your iPhone for seamless screen mirroring on your Tesla's impressive touchscreen every time you step into your Tesla vehicle.
üîç What You'll see:
Establishing Bluetooth connectivity between your iPhone and Tesla for audio transmission Configuring the TesDisplay app for swift activation using shortcuts Creating an automation in the Shortcuts app for automatic screen mirroring activation üîß Step-by-Step Breakdown:
Connect your iPhone's audio to your Tesla via Bluetooth. (Note: Check for potential dual Bluetooth connections on your iPhone, ensuring the audio link to your Tesla is established.) Within the TesDisplay app, set up a shortcut to instantly enable cellular data, activate the personal hotspot, and launch TesDisplay. Using the Shortcuts app, craft a new automation: locate and select Bluetooth, choose your Tesla, set it to trigger when 'Is connected,' and opt for 'Run Immediately.' Link this to the 'Start TesDisplay' shortcut for seamless integration. Follow these steps to ensure your iPhone smoothly mirrors its screen onto your Tesla display as soon as you enter your vehicle.
üöó Why It's Valuable: Automating this process elevates your driving experience, granting effortless access to your iPhone's functionalities and apps directly on your Tesla's touchscreen.
